name: MP3 Skype Recorder Temporary File
summary: An ID3TAG file is a temporary file created by MP3 Skype Recorder, a free program used to record Skype conversations. It contains metadata about a recorded conversation that is deleted once the recording is finished.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Created by MP3 Skype Recorder but cannot be opened by the program
